Package tiled.mapeditor.widget

Class Summary
BrushBrowser A panel that allows selecting a brush from a set of presets.
BrushPreview  
ColorButton A button with an associated color.
FloatablePanel A floatable panel.
ImageViewPanel  
IntegerSpinner The integer spinner is a variation on the JSpinner that is only to be used for plain integer inputs.
MiniMapViewer  
ResizePanel A special widget designed as an aid for resizing the map.
TabbedTilesetsPane Shows one tab for each Tileset.
TButton Tiled button extends on JButton in that it allows for not accepting any text from an attached action.
TilePalettePanel Displays a tileset and allows selecting a specific tile as well as selecting several tiles for the creation of a stamp brush.
TMenuItem Tiled menu item extends on JMenuItem in that it allows for not accepting any icon from an attached action.
VerticalStaticJPanel A variation on JPanel that will specify the preferred height as both the minimum and maximum.
